artist: Engraver: William Thomas Fry; Artist: Attributed to Girolamo da Carpi; Publisher: Jones & Co.
description: Portrait of Cardinal Ippolito de' Medici and Monsignor Mario Bracci; after a painting now attributed to Girolamo da Carpi.
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: Engraved by W.T.Fry / CARDINAL HIPPOLITO DE MEDICI, & / SEBASITANO DEL PIOMBO / From the Original Picture by Sebastiano del Piombo in / THE NATIONAL GALLERY / No. 37 / Jones & Co. Temple of the Muses, Finsbury Square, London | on sheet in pencil: 2-206
portfolio: From The National Gallery of Pictures by the Great Masters
title: Cardinal Hippolito De Medici and Sebastiano Del Piombo
